backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the library backend with types and state for books, borrow records, and user profiles, plus CRUD operations gated by role-based access control (admin/user permissions).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that LandingPage.tsx implements an autoplaying, muted, looping hero background video with overlay, fallback poster image, and all original content preserved above the video layer.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated JSON summaries of every frontend source file, describing each component's purpose, styling approach, and key functionality for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file importing Tailwind layers and defining OKLCH-based CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes covering background, foreground, card, sidebar, chart, and other UI color roles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Vite/React app, setting the page title to 'VEMU Institute of Technology Library Portal' and mounting the React root via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for landing, login, signup, student dashboard, and admin dashboard, wrapping the app in ThemeProvider and rendering a shared Navbar/Footer layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AddBookMod: Admin dialog form for adding a new book to the library, with validation and a backend mutation call via useAddBook.
frontend/src/components/admin/BorrowReco: Admin tab that displays all borrow records in a searchable, filterable table with status badges (active, returned, overdue), fetching data via useGetAllBorrowRecords and useGetAllBooks hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ManageBook: Admin tab for viewing and managing the book collection with search, add (via modal), and delete (stubbed as unsupported) functionality displayed in a table.
frontend/src/components/admin/ManageUser: Admin tab that lists all registered users in a searchable table showing name, email, truncated principal, role badge, and join date.
frontend/src/components/admin/OverviewTa: Admin dashboard overview tab that displays animated stat cards (total books, users, borrowed, overdue) and a quick summary list using data from useGetDashboardStats.
Reusable React component that animates a number from 0 to a target value using requestAnimationFrame with a cubic ease-out curve over a configurable duration.
frontend/src/components/BookCatalog.tsx: Book catalog component with search and category filter inputs, a responsive grid of book cards, borrow buttons with loading states, and toast notifications for borrow success or failure.
frontend/src/components/BorrowedBooksLis: Displays a tabbed list of a user's active and historical book borrowings, with overdue indicators and a return book action that calls the backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, quick navigation links, contact info, and a copyright notice for the VEMU Library Portal.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with logo, role-aware links (admin vs. user dashboard), theme toggle, login/logout actions, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that collects a new user's name and email on first login and saves the profile via the backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard that redirects unauthenticated users to login, enforces optional role requirements, and shows the ProfileSetupModal when no profile exists.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Icon button that toggles between light and dark themes using the ThemeContext.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: React context that wraps Internet Identity authentication, exposing isAuthenticated, login, logout (with query cache clearing), and loading states.
frontend/src/contexts/ThemeContext.tsx: React context that manages light/dark theme state, persisting the preference to localStorage and toggling the 'dark' class on the document root.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, reinitializing it when the Internet Identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile management, book CRUD operations, borrowing/returning books, and borrow history retrieval.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark theme tokens including navy, gold, and sidebar color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page with a collapsible sidebar navigation that switches between Overview, Manage Books, Manage Users, and Borrow Records tab components.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page featuring a hero section with a background video, animated statistics counters, and a feature grid showcasing the VEMU library system's capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page with Internet Identity authentication that redirects users to admin or student dashboard based on their role. Includes a styled form with role selector, username, password, and batch year fields (UI only) plus a login button.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: Sign-up page that uses Internet Identity login to create a new account, showing a step-by-step guide and redirecting authenticated users to the appropriate dashboard based on role.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Protected student dashboard with a tabbed layout containing a book catalog (browse) and a borrowed books list, with a personalized header showing the user's profile name.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts (Playfair Display, Inter), an extended color palette (navy, gold, warm-white), custom shadows, border radii, and keyframe animations for the library portal UI.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 13) describing the VEMU Library Portal's implemented features including landing page, authentication, student dashboard, and admin dashboard, along with architectural notes and known issues.
